title: GIVE PANTHEON HIS BAKER SKIN!
body:
if you type in /joke when playing pantheon, he'll tell you about how he wanted to be a baker lol.
Since pan is one of those champs without any cool skins (other than full metal and dragon), this skin should be an awesome new addition

replies.body: So could Morgana and Pantheon be friends then?
y not rival bakers?
TouchÃ©

I'm going to get a story I made on another guys post, and edit and paste it here when I find it.

EDIT: Found it!

{{champion:223}}: Pantheon! What progress you have made!
{{champion:80}}: THIS ESTABLISHMENT HAS HELPED ME REFINE MY BAKING SKILLS... I SHALL BECOME THE BEST BAKER IN THE WORLD!!!!
{{champion:25}} walks in to hear this
{{champion:25}}: YOU THINK YOU ARE THE BEST BAKER?!
{{champion:25}}: YOU! FAT FISH! MOVE OUT OF MY WAY! I MUST SHOW THIS PLEBEIAN MY BAKING SKILLS!
{{champion:80}}: NONE MAY MAKE BREAD AS GOOD AS MINE!!
{{champion:25}}: I MAKE, NOT BREAD, BUT SWEETS!
{{champion:223}}: Excuse me... Lady... I'm going to need you to get out of my shop...
{{champion:25}} Snares {{champion:223}} for the next hour
{{champion:223}}: Ah! Stop that!
{{champion:80}}: IT IS DECIDED THEN! WE SHALL HAVE A BAKE OFF!
{{champion:25}}: AGREED! AND THE FATTY WILL TASTE OUR BAKED GOODS
{{champion:223}}: Not that I'm against the idea, but who are you calling fa-
{{champion:25}}: WE BEGIN NOW!
..
...
....
.....
{{champion:80}}: IT IS DONE!
{{champion:25}}: INDEED IT IS!!
{{champion:223}}: Thank god... Can you get this binding off me now?
{{champion:25}}: NOT UNTIL YOU DECLARE ME THE BEST BAKER IN THE WORLD!!!
{{champion:80}}: NO, YOU WILL DECLARE ME THE BEST BAKER, OR YOU WILL HAVE A SPEAR TO THE FACE!
{{champion:223}} tried both of their goods.
{{champion:223}}: Pantheon... Your's is as good as ever... Morgana... Is your's... Burnt?
{{champion:25}}: WHAT?! NO! I HAVE JUST MADE SURE NOT TO LEAVE DOUGH IN THE CENTER!!!
{{champion:223}}: I don't think these are supposed to be black...
{{champion:25}}: DO NOT QUESTION ME!! I AM THE BEST BAKER IN THE WORLD- NO, THE UNIVERSE!!!!!!
{{champion:223}}: Please release me and get out of my shop.
{{champion:25}}: YOU WILL RUE THE DAY YOU ABANDONED ME!!! RUE IT I TELL YOU!!!
..
...
....
And so, Morgana set up a bakery across the street, and continued to burn the ever-loving shit out of her cookies...
lol

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Azmoth,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mBLKQLhd,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-19T09:48:31.880+0000)

> Since pan is one of those champs without any cool skins (other than full metal and dragon)

That sentence makes no sense to me.
Their is only one true pantheon skin. That skin is Mantheon! Or ruthless pantheon.
Says panth has no good skins, lists 2 really good skins, what.
Just going to put this out there.. A Pantheon Batman skin would be cooler. Bat signal ultimate. But I'd appreciate a baker skin too.

How does his **spear** and **shield** fit into the Batman concept?
Besides huge copyright issues there are **other champions** that would be more suitable for such a skin.

{{champion:35}} rips off Joker content. From Batman movie.

{{champion:80}} needs baker skin.
Oven door shield and pizza peel ( the long pole with the flat end used for putting pizza in and out of ovens)
His shield could be a large muffin, and his spear could be one of those cookie straw things I see at Starbucks. Make it happen!
Baguette spear and pizza stone shield.
Then I would main Panth :P
{{champion:223}} approves
I agree with you, especially since Full Metal and Dragon Knight aren't cool skins.
This has been a thing since Pantheon's conception. Rito simply hates us.
I wouldn't say he doesn't have any cool skins. Glaive Warrior is my favorite skin in the game..
Dragonslayer when you ult is freaking awesome.
RITO! MAKE IT SO!
